item.title: Zooey Deschanel, Tuning Up with She and Him
item.dc:creator: k
item.description: “Deschanel, who plays keyboards and sometimes drums in the band, joins Fresh Air to discuss her no-longer-secret life as a singer and songwriter, and the new album from She and Him, titled Volume One. ”
item.content:encoded: “Deschanel, who plays keyboards and sometimes drums in the band, joins Fresh Air to discuss her no-longer-secret life as a singer and songwriter, and the new album from She and Him, titled Volume One. ”

item.title: Sound Opinions – On Revolver, 40 years on
item.dc:creator: k
item.description: On yet another great show/podcast the guys at Sound Opinions discussed and dissected The Beatles’ Revolver 40+ years later. They’ve got an engineer from those recordings and the discussion covers recording techniques for songs like Tomorrow Never Knows, Rain, Eleanor Rigby, and of course Taxman. Here are the footnotes. Sound Opinions 117 (skip ahead about […]
item.content:encoded:
On yet another great show/podcast the guys at Sound Opinions discussed and dissected The Beatles’ Revolver 40+ years later. They’ve got an engineer from those recordings and the discussion covers recording techniques for songs like Tomorrow Never Knows, Rain, Eleanor Rigby, and of course Taxman. Here are the footnotes.

Sound Opinions 117 (skip ahead about 10 minutes to get to the Revolver discussion)

item.title: Girl Talk’s Gregg Gillis Talks
item.dc:creator: k
item.description: Chicago’s Public Radio beacon Sound Opinions recently featured Gregg Gillis of Girl Talk. “This week the sample-based collage artist joins Jim and Greg for a discussion about dance parties, biomedicine and running from the law.” The Podcast is available here.
item.content:encoded:
Chicago’s Public Radio beacon Sound Opinions recently featured Gregg Gillis of Girl Talk. “This week the sample-based collage artist joins Jim and Greg for a discussion about dance parties, biomedicine and running from the law.”

The Podcast is available here.
